Name: Sword of Burning Soul
Desc:
Creates a burning soul in the shape of a sword. Even if you attack an enemy that is in attack reflection mode, you will not take damage. When used with the down arrow key, you can summon it in a stationary state.
If you use a custom command, you can immediately summon it in a stationary state just by using the skill key without inputting the arrow key.
Custom command on/off: Right-click the
Required Skill: Razing Blow Lv. 30 or above
